the_nurse.name: Sally Smithson
the_nurse.back_story: Sally Smithson came to town with dreams of children’s feet and laughter in a wooden home built by her husband Andrew. But life came not with smiles but with plans of destruction. Andrew worked as a lumberjack - a job with its perils. And one day Andrew’s foreman had to pay Sally a visit, forever changing her life. She was alone. Without food on the table, the only employment she could get was at the Crotus Prenn Asylum. Nobody sought employment there unless they were in dire need. Just like Sally. Without any education, she started at the bottom and after two decades she hadn’t progressed any closer to the top. Instead her mind had reached its limits. Two decades of seeing horrid things that violates the eyes. Memories that are re-played every night. Being abused verbally and physically, by people without limits. Sally saw insanity from the outside, just to catch it herself. Finally she could not take it anymore and concepts of purification emerged inside her. She did what she felt was necessary. As the morning staff arrived one day in September - they found over fifty dead patients, lifeless, in their bed. Sally was the only one at the scene, rocking back and forth. Exactly what happened is only known by her, but it seems that some of them had been choked as they had marks around their necks.

weapon.name: The Bonesaw
weapon.Description:
The Bonesaw is the primary weapon of the Nurse. Rusty metal implement for tearing through flesh and bone.

  • When she attacks, she swings her whole body into the swing.
  • When hitting a survivor, she wipes the blood off with her fingers.
  • The Bonesaw has a shorter lunge-attack range, but a larger range itself. This means that the Nurse has a bigger chance of hitting them by clicking than the other killers, but less of a chance when holding the attack button down.

power.name: Spencer's Last Breath
power.description:
A powerful and violent last breath snatched from Crotus Prenn Asylum Warden Patrick Spencer.
Channelling its energy allows The Nurse to pierce and jump through the Spirit World in a blink multiple times in a row. Doing so leaves her in a state of fatigue.


SPENCER'S LAST BREATH:
Press and hold the Power button to charge a Blink:

  • Blink for up to 20 metres upon activation.
    • During the ensuing Chain Blink Window, charge again to initiate a Chain Blink of up to 12 metres upon activation.
    • After either the Chain Blink Window closed or the final Chain Blink elapsed, enter a state of Fatigue (2-3 seconds*).
  • Grants 1 Chain Blink.

gasp.title: Gasp!
gasp.description:
Awarded for causing a Survivor to scream when blinking by them.
Requires the use of Anxious Gasp .

lethal_blink.title: Lethal Blink
lethal_blink.description: Awarded for hitting a Survivor after blinking before going into fatigue.

precise_blink.title: Precise Blink
precise_blink.description: Awarded for landing a Blink that initiates a Chase.

surprise_blink.title: Surprise Blink
surprise_blink.description: Awarded after interrupting a Survivor interacting with a Prop after performing a Blink.

chain_blink_charge_number.title: Number of chain blinks charges available

post_blink_grunts_of_pain.title: Grunts of Pain Volume after hitting the Survivor with a successful post-Blink Attack for 60 seconds

post_blink_attack_heal_aura.title: Able to see survivor healing or being healed after a successful post-blink attack for 60 seconds

post_blink_attack_spencer_available.title: Able to use Spencer's Last Breath after a successful post-blink attack for 60 seconds

post_blink_teleport_back.title: Able to go back to original position after a blink

post_full_blink_auto_blink.title: After a full charged blink immediately blink at half charge in the direction facing

post_blink_attack_undetectable.title: Gain Undetectable status effect for 16 seconds every 60 seconds after a successful post-blink attack

post_blink_attack_base_movement.title: Movement Speed after a successful post-blink attack for 60 seconds

blink_target_location.title: Able to see Blink Target Locations

fatigue_1_missed_attack.title: Fatigue caused by 1 Blink and a post-blink missed attack

fatigue_2_missed_attack.title: Fatigue caused by 2 Blink and a post-blink missed attack

fatigue_3_missed_attack.title: Fatigue caused by 3 Blink and a post-blink missed attack

blink_token_recharge_time.title: Time to recharge each blink token

wooden_horse.name: Wooden Horse
wooden_horse.description:
An unpainted toy carved out of cheap wood to resemble a horse. Once the symbol of a deep connection between a catatonic patient and his nurse.
  • Moderately decreases additional post-Blink Fatigue duration applied by missed Blink Attacks.

white_nit_comb.name: White Nit Comb
white_nit_comb.description:
A parasitic nit comb taken from the clinic. Once the symbol of a deep connection between an anxious patient and her nurse.
  • Increases Bloodpoints for Blink Attack Score Events by 100 %.
  • Moderately decreases post-Blink Lunge range.

plaid_flannel.name: Plaid Flannel
plaid_flannel.description:
A torn piece of red and black plaid flannel. The scrap of fabric imbues The Nurse with devastating focus.
  • Allows The Nurse to see Blink Target Locations.

metal_spoon.name: Metal Spoon
metal_spoon.description:
A dull, partially rusted and stained metallic spoon. Confiscated from Room 202's patient, the "Bad Man".
  • Moderately increases Grunts of Pain Volume after hitting the Survivor with a successful post-Blink Attack.
  • This effects lasts for 60 seconds.

pocket_watch.name: Pocket Watch
pocket_watch.description:
A charred and broken pocket watch with rattling pieces. Taken from Nurse Moris' body.
  • Moderately increases Chain Blink Window duration.

dull_bracelet.name: Dull Bracelet
dull_bracelet.description:
A worthless piece of jewellery that might have an important significance to someone. Taken from the "Anxious Girl's" body.
  • Increases Bloodpoints for Precise Blink Score Events by 100 %.
  • Moderately decreases maximum Blink range.

dark_cincture.name: Dark Cincture
dark_cincture.description:
A black rope used as a belt in times of mourning. Taken from Father Campbell's body.
  • Moderately reduces Blink Recharge time.

catatonic_boys_treasure.name: Catatonic Boy's Treasure
catatonic_boys_treasure.description:
A pine-cone which unexpectedly calmed a patient's repetitive movement. Taken from the "Catatonic Boy's" body.
  • Considerably decreases additional post-Blink Fatigue duration applied by Chain Blinks.

bad_man_keepsake.name: Bad Man Keepsake
bad_man_keepsake.description:
A rotten molar ripped from the "Bad Man's" cold dead hand.
  • The Aura of a Survivor healing or being healed is revealed to The Nurse within 28 metres after hitting the Survivor with a successful post-Blink Attack.
  • This effect lasts for 60 seconds.

spasmodic_breath.name: Spasmodic Breath
spasmodic_breath.description:
The twitchy and tremulous breath stolen from the "Bad Man". Aggressively pulses and jumps at The Nurse's touch.
  • Temporarily disables Spencer's Last Breath and increases The Nurse's base Movement speed to 4.6 m/s after hitting a Survivor with a successful post-Blink Attack.
  • This effect lasts for 60 seconds.

heavy_panting.name: Heavy Panting
heavy_panting.description:
The slow and bulging breath stolen from the "Fat Orderly" Kavanagh. Dimly oscillates at The Nurse's touch.
  • Considerably increases maximum Blink range.
  • Considerably increases Blink Charge time.

fragile_wheeze.name: Fragile Wheeze
fragile_wheeze.description:
The whistling and rattling breath stolen from Father Campbell. Silently curves and bends at The Nurse's touch.
  • Considerably reduces Blink Recharge time.

ataxic_respiration.name: Ataxic Respiration
ataxic_respiration.description:
The irregular and deteriorating breath collected from the "Catatonic Boy". Normally stable and calm, becomes incredibly agitated at The Nurse's touch.
  • Moderately decreases post-Blink Fatigue duration.

anxious_gasp.name: Anxious Gasp
anxious_gasp.description:
The gasp of surprise collected from the "Anxious Girl", which the Nurse was fond of. Twitches vigorously at The Nurse's touch.
  • Blinking past a Survivor causes them to scream and awards 200 Bloodpoints in the Deviousness Category.

kavanaghs_last_breath.name: Kavanagh's Last Breath
kavanaghs_last_breath.description:
A powerful last breath snatched from Crotus Prenn Asylum Orderly Harvey Kavanagh, the "Fat Orderly". In the hands of The Nurse, it wobbles with intensity.
  • Tremendously increases maximum Blink range.
  • Tremendously increases Blink Charge time.

jenners_last_breath.name: Jenner's Last Breath
jenners_last_breath.description:
A powerful last breath snatched from Crotus Prenn Asylum Patient Mary Jenner, the "Anxious Girl". In the hands of The Nurse, it trembles with intensity.
  • After Blinking, allows The Nurse to immediately Blink back to her original position by pressing the Active Ability Button.
  • This effect must be triggered before The Nurse succumbs to post-Blink Fatigue.

campbells_last_breath.name: Campbell's Last Breath
campbells_last_breath.description:
A powerful last breath snatched from Crotus Prenn Asylum Priest Father Campbell. In the hand of The Nurse, it crackles with intensity.
  • After reappearing from a fully charged Blink, The Nurse immediately Blinks at half charge in the direction she is currently facing.

bad_mans_last_breath.name: "Bad Man's" Last Breath
bad_mans_last_breath.description:
A powerful last breath snatched from Crotus Prenn Asylum Patient known as the "Bad Man". In the hands of The Nurse, it jolts with intensity.
  • Grants The Nurse the Undetectable Status Effect after hitting a Survivor with a successful post-Blink Attack.
  • This effect lasts for 16 seconds and may only be triggered once every 60 seconds.

torn_bookmark.name: Torn Bookmark
torn_bookmark.description:
A white and pristine piece of ribbon once attached to a sacred book. Serves as the symbol of a dispute.
  • Adds 1 Chain Blink Charge.
  • The Nurse can no longer Blink through solid objects.

matchbox.name: Matchbox
matchbox.description:
A matchbox containing an odd collection of mismatched buttons. Serves as a reminder of a horrible place.
  • Increases The Nurse's Movement speed to 4.2 m/s.
  • Removes 1 Chain Blink Charge.
